definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: There were armoured personnel carriers and tanks on the streets…
sentences.chinese: 街上有裝甲運兵車和坦克。

sentences.english: Metal-wheeled chariots are the prototype of the tanks of modern warfare.
sentences.chinese: 金屬輪戰車是現代戰爭中坦克的原型。

sentences.english: Make sure you have anti-tank and anti-air support for your Artillery.
sentences.chinese: 確保你的炮兵擁有反坦克和防空支援。

sentences.english: Added an option to turn off smoke and dust off the tank tracks.
sentences.chinese: 增加了可以關閉坦克行駛時的煙霧和揚塵的選項。

sentences.english: However, its role is more that of a super-heavy tank destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 怎麼說呢，他時常扮演一個超重型的坦克殺手角色。

sentences.english: Tanks were sent in agai t unarmed students.
sentences.chinese: 出動坦克車對付手無寸鐵的學生。
坦克轟隆轟隆地沿路開過。

sentences.english: According to data of eye-witnesses around Nablus tanks were stationed also approximately.
sentences.chinese: 據資料目擊者納布盧斯附近的坦克也派駐了大約。

sentences.english: Tanks rumbled down the streets of Deraa, trying to seize the city back from protesters.
sentences.chinese: 坦克駛進德拉的街頭，試圖抓獲回城的抗議者。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traumatizing effects of an anti tank missile.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察某型反坦克導彈對犬的致傷效應。

sentences.english: Political hooligans with tanks, missiles and guns!
sentences.chinese: 政治淌氓，坦克，導彈，槍支。

sentences.english: The gyroscope in tank is used to stabilize the aim system of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 坦克中的陀螺儀用於穩定火炮的瞄準系統。

sentences.english: However, the size and weight of the King Tiger had its share of problems.
sentences.chinese: 但是，大小和重量是虎王坦克問題。

sentences.english: I must mention that life in a tank without the tarpaulin was hard.
sentences.chinese: 必須指出，在坦克裏生活，沒有防水帆布是很艱難的。

sentences.english: The defenders were doing reasonably well until the attackers brought their tanks into play.
sentences.chinese: 知道進攻者出動坦克之前，防禦者的阻擊相當出色。

sentences.english: I drove into Rome on a tank when the city was liberated.
sentences.chinese: 當時我開着一輛坦克駛入剛剛被解放的羅馬城。

definition: half-track (vehicle with wheels at the front and continuous tracks in the rear)
